briefTitle: Efficacy and Safety of FS VH S/D 4 S-apr for Flap Adherence in Rhytidectomy
officialTitle: A Randomized, Controlled Phase 3 Study to Evaluate Safety and Efficacy of Fibrin Sealant (FS) VH S/D 4 S-apr (ARTISS) to Adhere Tissues and Improve Wound Healing in Subjects Undergoing Rhytidectomy (Facelift)
summary: The purpose of the study is to compare the safety and efficacy of FS VH S/D 4 s-apr versus standard of care in adhering tissue and improving wound healing in subjects undergoing facelift.

primaryOutcome.measure: Total Volume of Drainage on Each Side of the Face
